Uses of Interface
org.springframework.web.servlet.function.RouterFunction

Packages that use RouterFunction
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
Support for testing Spring MVC applications via RestTestClient with MockMvc for server request handling.
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.setup
Contains built-in MockMvcBuilder implementations.
org.springframework.web.servlet.function
Provides the types that make up Spring's functional web framework for Servlet environments.
org.springframework.web.servlet.function.support
Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.servlet.function package.
